mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Manassas Junction from I. H. Slusher at Greasy Creek
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, October 20, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Manassas Junction, Virginia, from I. H. Slusher at Greasy Creek, Va. Subject: Mr. Slusher’s illness. 2 original pieces – letter and envelope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
